#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
const long long int MAXN=1e5+1;
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
#define pc(x) putchar_unlocked(x)
ll scan()
{
    ll x=0;
    char c=gc();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=gc();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=x*10+c-'0';
        c=gc();
    }
    return x;
}
 
void fastWrite(ll x)
{
    char s[21]={' '};
    int l=0;
    do
    {
        s[l++]=x%10+'0';
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    --l;
    while(l>=0)
    {
        pc(s[l--]);
    }
    pc('\n');
}
int main()
{
 
 
    int T;
    ll N;
    ll K;
    ll M;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        N=scan();K=scan();M=scan();
        ll i;
        if(K==(ll)(1))
        {
            fastWrite(N);
            continue;
        }
        while(N%K==0&&M)
        {
           N/=K;
           M--;
        }
 
        if(M&1)
            fastWrite(N*K);
        else
            fastWrite(N);
    }
    return 0;
}
